field.label: Enable Bazaarvoice Extension
field.comment: Enable all Bazaarvoice Magento extension features at this Magento Scope

field.label: Client Name
field.comment: Client Name as defined in your BV platform account

field.label: Deployment Zone
field.comment: Deployment Zone Name as defined in your BV platform account

field.label: Locale
field.comment: The BV locale for this Magento Configuration Scope. For example: "en_US". The locale must be enabled within your BV platform account.

field.label: Enable Cloud SEO
field.comment: Turn on the BV SEO solution. This will include SEO-friendly content (located in the BV SEO cloud) in your product pages. See documentation for additional steps that must be completed for this feature to take effect.

field.label: Cloud SEO Key
field.comment: SEO Cloud key value as defined in your BV platform account. This key is only required if Cloud SEO is enabled.

field.label: Enable ROI Beacon
field.comment: Turn on the BV ROI beacon tag on the purchase transaction (checkout) page. See documentation for additional steps that must be completed for this feature to take effect.

field.label: Enable BV Product Families
field.comment: BV Product Families will be defined for visible Configurable and Simple product combinations

field.label: Enable Ratings & Reviews
field.comment: Turn on BV Ratings & Reviews. This will enable display of R&R content on your product pages. See documentation for additional steps that must be completed for this feature to take effect.

field.label: Use Submission Container Page
field.comment: Turn on BV submission container page.

field.label: JS Callback function to display R&R content (doShowContent)
field.comment: The Bazaarvoice doShowContent javascript callback is triggered when the "read all reviews" link in the review summary is clicked. You may provide code here that you wish to execute on said click event. For example, you may want to activate a specific tab on the page. This code will be wrapped in a javascript function(){...} block. See your Bazaarvoice Implementation manual for further information.

field.label: Enable Hosted Inline Ratings
field.comment: Turn on BV Hosted inline ratings. This will enable display of product rating statistics in various store areas. See documentation for additional steps that must be completed for this feature to take effect.

field.label: Enable Questions & Answers
field.comment: Turn on BV Questions & Answers. This will enable display of Q&A content on your product pages. See documentation for additional steps that must be completed for this feature to take effect.

field.label: JS Callback function to display Q&A content (doShowContent)
field.comment: The Bazaarvoice doShowContent javascript callback is triggered when the "read all Q&A" link in the question/answer summary is clicked. You may provide code here that you wish to execute on said click event. For example, you may want to activate a specific tab on the page. This code will be wrapped in a javascript function(){...} block. See your Bazaarvoice Implementation manual for further information.

field.label: Enable Product Feed
field.comment: Turn on Product Feed generation. This will enable generation of a product feed to be sent to the BV SFTP server. See documentation for additional steps to setup a scheduled job in Magento for this feature to take effect.

field.label: Feed Generation Scope
field.comment: This determines whether separate feed files will be generated and sent to BV for each website, store or store view.

field.label: SFTP Username
field.comment: SFTP Connection Username. If this is left blank, the above Client Name will be used.

field.label: SFTP Password
field.comment: Password used to access the BV SFTP server for feed upload/download processes.

field.label: SFTP Host Name
field.comment: SFTP Connection Host.

field.label: Brand Attribute
field.comment: This attribute code will be used to locate the brand of products which are sent in the product feed.

field.label: UPC Attribute
field.comment: This attribute code will be used to locate the UPC of products which are sent in the product feed.

field.label: EAN Attribute
field.comment: This attribute code will be used to locate the EAN of products which are sent in the product feed.

field.label: Manufacturer Part Number Attribute
field.comment: This attribute code will be used to locate the Manufacturer Part Number of products which are sent in the product feed.

field.label: ISBN Attribute
field.comment: This attribute code will be used to locate the ISBN of products which are sent in the product feed.

field.label: Expand Families in Product Feed
field.comment: Setting to determine whether simple products show reviews and ratings for their entire product family.

field.label: Use category URL path as category id
field.comment: If true, use Magento category URL path as category id, otherwise use Mage category entity primary key.

field.label: Enable Purchase Feed
field.comment: Turn on Purchase Feed generation. This will enable generation of a purchase feed to be sent to the BV SFTP server to be used to send post-interaction emails to your customers in order to solicit review submission. See documentation for additional steps to setup a scheduled job for this feature to take effect.

field.label: Purchase Feed Lookback
field.comment: Number of days back to begin looking for orders.

field.label: Purchase Feed Triggering Event
field.comment: This determines whether to use the purchase date or ship date when calculating which purchases to include in the purchase feed.
